name: Grapple Fishing (GMTK 2021)
description:
W A S D or Arrow Keys to turn, SPACE to grapple, R to retry level.

If you get a Windows warning message click "more info" and then "run anyway"

Help Pingino win the Fish Catcher's Toolkit fishing jam by using your grapple hook. Made for the GMTK 2021 Game Jam.

Music: https://www.chosic.com/download-audio/?t=24158&tag=Games

Everything else by me.
